segments.text: Hi , Francis , morning ! How are you doing today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a bad start of the day . I was stuck in a bad traffic jam on my way and I missed my morning meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Indeed , I agree that is not a good start . How about the meeting ? You missed anything important ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is ok . My boss briefs me later on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Was he unhappy with you not attending the meeting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Err , kind of . You know this traffic jam is really bad with so many new cars hitting the streets these days .
segments.speaker: S2
